sentences.english: The results show that the vortex motion is unstable for small three-dimensional disturbances in the separated wake of a circular cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，圆柱分离尾迹中的旋涡存在三维不稳定性。

sentences.english: The instability of morphological variation in flower of Z. grandiflora might be related to transposable genetic element.
sentences.chinese: 花形变异的不稳定性可能与转座遗传因子有关。

sentences.english: Such divorce makes the spiral mode of density waves in a disk-shaped galaxy unstable;
sentences.chinese: 这样的分离导致密度波的旋涡模式的不稳定性。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the new methods of posterior approach for the atlantoaxial instability.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍寰枢椎不稳的后路内固定治疗的新方法。

sentences.english: Although unstable even walking away, but my heart still flattered it?
sentences.chinese: 虽然连走路都走不稳，但心里还是美滋滋的呢？

sentences.english: This table must be wedged up because it is unsteady.
sentences.chinese: 这张桌子必须楔牢，因为它不稳。

sentences.english: If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky ground。(Ibsen, Norwegian dramatist)
sentences.chinese: 如果你怀疑自己，那么你的立足点确实不稳固了。

sentences.english: This created insecurity within yourself and instability in your life.
sentences.chinese: 这就于你自身产生了风险，以及生活中的不稳定性。

sentences.english: The ill-posedness inherent in the bandlimited signal extrapolation problem can be treated by means of regularization parameters.
sentences.chinese: 引进正则参数能够处理数据外推问题的内在不稳定性。

sentences.english: Absolute instability is a major physics limitation in the realization of the ultimate capability of gyro-traveling-wave tube.
sentences.chinese: 绝对不稳定性是制约回旋行波管性能的主要因素之一。

sentences.english: Don't place breakables on unstable tables.
sentences.chinese: 不要将易碎物品放在不稳的桌子上。

sentences.english: If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky.
sentences.chinese: 如果怀疑自己，你的出发点就不稳固了。

sentences.english: The men in recon were clumsy now and uncertain of their footing .
sentences.chinese: 侦察排的战士到这时候又都腿脚不灵，步履不稳了。

sentences.english: Lady Vashj slithers up from some green water in the prison.
sentences.chinese: 瓦许女士不稳的在有毒的绿水里滑行，慢慢的站起来。

sentences.english: Finally introduced the Sangtana motor car engine idling regime not steady overhaul example.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔纳汽车发动机怠速不稳的检修实例。

sentences.english: The table wobbled because one of the legs shorter than the others.
sentences.chinese: 因为桌子有一条腿短，所以放不稳。

definition: variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
loose/slack/(fig.) to soften (policies, tone of voice)/to give some slack/(of a place) not crowded
less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
